overview.title: University Overview
overview.content: Jojet International University (JIU) is a leading institution of higher education committed to academic excellence, innovative research, and global engagement. Founded with the vision of providing world-class education, JIU has grown to become one of the most prestigious universities in the region.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.visionContent: To be a globally recognized center of excellence in education and research, shaping future leaders who will contribute to the sustainable development of society.
vision.missionContent: To provide transformative education through innovative teaching, cutting-edge research, and community engagement, while fostering a diverse and inclusive learning environment.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 1995, Jojet International University began as a small college with a vision to transform education in the region. Over the past three decades, we have grown into a comprehensive university with multiple campuses, offering programs across various disciplines.

academics.title: Academics
academics.subtitle: Discover our diverse range of programs

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate Programs
undergraduate.description: Choose from over 40 undergraduate programs across various disciplines.

graduate.title: Graduate Programs
graduate.description: Advance your career with our master's and doctoral programs.

studentLife.title: Student Life
studentLife.subtitle: Experience vibrant campus life at JIU

campus.title: Campus Life
campus.content: Our campuses offer a vibrant and diverse community where students can learn, grow, and make lifelong connections.

housing.title: Student Housing
housing.content: We offer comfortable on-campus accommodation options with modern amenities and 24/7 security.

activities.title: Student Activities
activities.content: Join over 50 student clubs and organizations, from academic societies to cultural and sports clubs.
